actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reinstate the excise tax on certain vaccines and extend the Vaccine Injury Compensation Trust Fund.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the excise tax on certain vaccines and the Vaccine Injury Compensation Trust Fund through 1994. Requires a report to specified congressional committees on a study of the administration of such trust fund. Imposes a floor stocks tax on certain vaccines.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reinstate the excise tax on certain vaccines and extend the Vaccine Injury Compensation Trust Fund.
